comment: Fall 2019. Additional cost: WebAssign (homework). Everything in the lectures (downloadable), no book necessary. Takes attendance (most of the time). Uses gamer references (former WoW player) and sports references to keep class engaged. Lectures otherwise dry. VERY patient. Always willing to answer questions, no matter how trivial. Friendly.

If you like professors that talk a lot but don't really have anything to say, this guy is for you.
